str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
(a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make old, declare obsolete; pass: I grow old, become obsolete. From palaios; to make worn out, or declare obsolete.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
First, before, principal, most important. Contracted superlative of pro; foremost.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To make old, declare obsolete; pass: I grow old, become obsolete. From palaios; to make worn out, or declare obsolete.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To become old, grow old. From geras; to be senescent.
Near. From a primary verb agcho; near.
Disappearing, disappearance, obliteration. From aphanizo; disappearance, i.e. abrogation.
